p: Monolayers of BHK-21 in 96-well plates were used. OPF and anticoagulated blood samples were inoculated in quadruplicate, performing three passages of 48Â h each, and examined for cytopathic effect. The positive samples were titrated in tenfold serial dilutions from undiluted to 10 -6 dilution. The virus titers calculated by the Reed and Muench Method [13] was expressed as TCID50%/ml.
